posts.postText:
1) Which server: TTT
2) Offender's name: NetskyeN
3) Offender's SteamID: STEAM_0:0:36152624
4) Explain the situation in detail: He was a detective and he rdm people with no reason at all
5) Were any specific server rules broken: Rdm and Rule 5
6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence: Nope

Anyway, banned and locked.
